headerText: The `v-footer` component is used for displaying general information that a user might want to access from any page within your site.

usage.desc: The footer component is just a basic container.

companyFooter.desc: The footer component as a basic company footer with links.

indigoFooter.desc: The footer component with Indigo background color and social media icons and button.

tealFooter.desc: The footer component with a Teal color header and columns and rows of links.

props.inset: Positions the toolbar offset from an application `v-navigation-drawer`
